content:
Hi folks! We're looking for FHIR Developers for a paid research study. See below.
--

Smile CDR is a health tech company that maintains the leading interoperability platform for connected health solutions based on HL7® FHIR®. We are conducting research for a new product, and your feedback is important to us. We are offering a $100CAD ($80USD) reward for participating in a one (1) hour research study. The study consists of a remote video interview. Times are flexible and can be scheduled during or after business hours, and across time zones.

Eligibility criteria:

  • Be a FHIR software developer or vendor
  • Developing enterprise health products or services that work with a FHIR server
  • Selling the above to healthcare providers or health insurers

To sign up, or for more information about the study, contact vanessa@smilecdr.com, subject line: Smile UXR Developer.
--
